title: Engineer Muhammad Ali Mirza STUDENTS ki Adalat mein ! A Special Session Recorded on 27-March-2022 !!

questions.text: Introduction !!
Engineer "Mei Mei" Karta Hai ?? Apnay Views Ginwana Takabbur Hai ??
Ghamidi Sb Engineer Sb ki Waja say Mashoor Huwe ?? Hassan Ilyaas Aur Ghamidi Sb ka Engineer Sahab pe Tuhmat Lagna ?? Kitabei bhi Babo ne Di Hai ??
Quraan Parhtay Hwe Ali Bhai ne Ghaltia Ki ?? Imam ki Ali Bhai ne Toheen ki ??
Muslim Ilmi Kitabi Aik Firqa Ban Giya Hai ?? Ilmi Kitabi Kehna Kesa Hai ??
Appearance mei Deen ?? Deen k Mubaligh ka Huliya Kesa Hona Chahye ??
Mini God ka Concept Shirk hai ?? "Mini GOD" of JANNAH ??? Why ALLAH Created Me ??? Why I Love ALLAH ???
Mufti Hanif Qureshi say Qadianio ko Musalman Manay wali Ibarat pe Discussion !! Taleeq Bin Muhaal Aur Mantiq !!
Qadiani Mazloom hai ??
Apnay Ghamidi Sb ko Jaahil Keh Kar Bara Bhari Jumla Keh diya Hai ??
Ali Bhai ka Baray Ulema Ko Challenge ?? Ali bhai say Questions Karei ?? Ali Bhai Sirf Baro K Sath Kyun Bethay Gay ??
Ali Bhai Sirf Baro K Sath Kyun Bethay Gay ??
Engineer Aur Engineer k Students ko Sahaba say Zyada Takleefei Ai Hai ??
Reply to Mufti Tariq Masood !! Babay Margay, Unkay Ihtilafaat Puranay Ho gay Thay Engineer nay Dubara say Purani Baatei Uhai Hai ??
Research Paper 5-B Mei Zaeef Ahadith Hai ?? Salaf ka Hazrat Muawiya pe Moaqiff ??
Reply to Munkareen-e-Hadith Dr Hafiz Zubair, Baghi Groh say Muraad Chahnay wala Groh Hai ??
Ap Poori Dawat mei Sirf Tanqeed Hi Kartay hai General Public Kiya Karay ?? Amar bil Maroof Aur Nahi Al Munkar !!
Ap Munazaro k Khillaf hai Aur Phir bhi Challenges Dete Rehte Hai ??? Mufti Tariq Masood say Samooso pe hi Baat Kar Lete ?? Pehle Muqadama Kyun Discuss Hoga ??
Kisi pe Kuffar ka Fatwa Laganay pe Banda Khud Kaafir ho Jata ??
Mantiq ki Behasei Aur Ulema Soo ki Munafiqana Approach !! Har Waqt Problem end pe Kharay Hona ?? Tablighi Jumaat Aur Munafqat ??
Ulema Haq bhi Hotay hai ??
Istiwa Al Arsh ka Sahi Aqeeda Kiya Hai ??
Ummat ko Khilafat ki Zaroorat hai Aur Ap Khilafat ko Importance hi ni Dete ??
Ap Kehte hai Mubahala jo Hai wo Dawa-e-Nabuwwat k Barabar Hai ??
Ap Music Aur Gustakh-e-Rasool pe Ghamidi Sb ki Taraf Refer Kar Dete Hai, Kyun ??
Music Qawali Haraam ya Halaal ??
Aurato Aur Bacho k Samny Sex say Related Molvio k Waqiyaat Ap Kyun Discuss Kartay Hai ?? Muhammad Baksh Sahab ki Zubani Ulema ka Kirdaar !! School vs Madarassa !!
Ulema k Paas Kese Jayei ?? Ulema say Ganday waqiat ki Kese Discussion Karay ??  School vs Madarassa !!
Maulana Ishaaq ka Apnay Aap ko Hussain ka Kutta Kehan Jaiz Hai ??
Aj Kal k Barelvi Deobandi Apnay Buzurgo k Parhay Huwe Kalmo say Aelan-e-Baraat Kar Chukay hai to Ap Uski Kyun Lakeer Peetay Hai ??
72 Firqo ka Kiya Hoga ?? Agar Log Haq Qubool hi ni karay gay to Dawat Kyun De Gay ??
"Mei Hussain say hu Aur Hussain Mujh say Hai" Is say Imam Hussain ki Fazeelat ni Sabit Hoti ??
Conclusion !! Sirf Baro say Kyun Discussion Hogi ??
Dua !!

title: Mooroo Podcast #48 Engineer Muhammad Ali Mirza

questions.text: Introduction !!
Apnay Apnay Naam k Sath "Maulana" ya "Mufti" Kyun Ni Lagaya ?? Sirf "Engineer" Kyun ??
Apnay Engineering ki Dawat Bhi Ni Deni ?? School Universities vs Madarassa System ??
Log Science Parh k Deen say Door Aur Anti God Kyun Hotay ??
Jadeed Ulema mei Science k Ilm ki Kami Kyun Hai ??
Quraan ki Zaban Zinda ?? Arabic Literature ka Moajza ?? Arabic ka Konsa Tarjuma Moatabar Hai ??
Quran ki Interpretations mei Ikhtilafaat Kyun ??
Quran ka Mafhoom Aik Hi Hai to Firqay Kyun ??
Dunya ka Maqsad Imtehaan Hai to Zindagi Guzarnay ki Kesi Approach Honi Chahye k Deen pe Amal Karay ??
Agar Ibadat ka Matlab/Maqsad na Pata ho to Ibadat ka Koi Faida Hai ??
Ulema Hamesha Sawal pe Sakhti Kartay Hai Aur Ilm ni Sikhatay ??
Athiesm Christianity ka Revenge (Rad-e-Amal) Hai ??
Music Say Mene Kafi Kuch Sikha hai Ap Isko Haraam Kyun Kehtay ??
Sex Discipline ka Maqsad Family System hai ??
Aurat Mard mei Dostana Rishtay ki Kiya Hasiyyat Hai ??
Parday ko Ap Kaha Tak Zaroori Samajhtay Hai ?? Kis Kis Cheez ka Parda Hai ??
Taqleed Kis Had Tak Karni Hoti Hai ?? Taqleed Karna Kesa Hai ?? Firqo mei Taqleed, Tasawwuf say Related Stats pe Comments !!
Tasawwuf ko Rad Kar k Rohaniyat Bilkul Khatam Ni Ho Jati ??
Tawatur mei Koi Ghalti ki Gunjaish Hai ??
Quran Tawatur Say Chalnay wali Sunnat mei Addition k Liye Aya ??
Kis Ijima mei Ghalti Ni Ho Sakti ?? Tasweer pe Ummat ka Ijima ?? Deen mei Mushabihat ??
Tattoo ka Shari Hukam ??
Conclusion Aur Dua !!

title: Nadir Ali Podcast Featuring Engineer Muhammad Ali Mirza

questions.text: Introduction !!
Ali Bhai ki Source of Income Kiya Hai ??
Gher Muslim k Liye R.I.P Likhna Kesa Hai ??
BJP Leader, Nur Pur Sharma Aur Rasool Allah صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم ki Gustakhi ??
Dosray Religion ki Tauheen kiye Beghair Dawat Kese Dei ??
Gharelo Jhagraat Pe Kiya Karei ?? Biwi Ko Maan Baap K Kehnay Pe Talaaq Kesa Hai ??
Mia Biwi mei Secrets ?? Kis Had tak Wives k sath sharing honi Chahye ??
Eid ki Qurbani Kis Kis ne Ghar mei Karni Hoti ??
4 Shadia Karna Sunnat hai Ya Sirf Ijazat Hai ??
Pichli Biwi ko Bataye Beghair Shadi Karna Jaiz Hai ??
Cigarette pe Islamic Rulings ??
Maan Baap k Hajj Kiye Beghair Aulaad bhi Hajj Ni kar Sakti ??
Buhat Zyada Masroofiat mei Namazo ko Jama Kis Hadd Tak Kar Saktay ?? Saari namazei Jama Kar Saktay ??
Shararat, Masti Aur Fun k Kamo mei Death Ho Janay walay pe Kiya Fatwa Hai ??
Hurmat-e-Musaharaat Kiya Hotay Hai Aur Unkay Kiya Masail Hai ??
Qurbani ki Khaal ko Bechna Kesa Hai ?? Uspay kiya Shari Fatwa Hai ??
Qurbani K Janwar Mei Aeb ?? Agar Aeb Ka Pata Na Chalay To Kiya Karei ??
Publically Qurbani k Janwar ki Numaish Kesi Hai ??
Conclusion !!

title: Reply to Hafiz Saad Rizvi حفظہ اللہ of TLP on "05-Gustakhian of BABAs" ! Engineer Muhammad Ali Mirza

questions.text: Teaser !!
Hafiz Saad Rizvi ka Ilzaam !!
Buzurgo ka Taaruf Khadim Rizvi ne Karaya !!
Barelvi, Deobandi Ahl-e-Hadith Bhai Bhai ?? Sulah-e-Kulli ??
Reply to Saad Rizvi, Engineer Logo ko Babo say Door Karta !! Buzurgo k Taruf pe 5 References !!!
Ref # 1: Imam Ahmed Raza Khan Barelvi ka Chishti Rasool Allah Kalma ko Endorse Karna !!
Ref # 2: Kashaf Al-Majoob mei Nabi صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم pe Sukar ka Ilzaam (Naoozubillah) !! Nabi صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم ne Zaib bin Harisa رضي الله عنه ki Biwi ko Naked Dekha (Naoozubillah) !!
Ref # 3: Kashaf Al-Majoob mei Nabi صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم ki Qabar mei Hadiyon (Naoozubillah) ka Zikar !!
Ref # 4: Kashaf Al-Majoob mei Ba Yazeed Bustami ka Mutakabarna Dawa, Unkay mu say Allah Bolta !! Tamam Ambia Ba Yazeed k Jhanday k Neechay Ho gay (Naoozubillah) !!
Ref # 5: Tazkaratul Aulia mei Ba Yazeed ke Meraj !!
Election Voting Offer to Saad Rizvi !!
Buzurgo Ki Shatriaat Muaaf Hai ??
